languages.text: "Я помню все в мельчайших деталях. Как на корабль напали, как я схватила оружие и бросилась к ней, полагая, что должна защитить избранницу Императора. И что я увидела, вбежав в кабинет? Теодору фон Валанциус, Вольного Торговца — со зловещим колдовским артефактом в руках, сияющим нечистым светом!"

traits.locale_text: "Я помню все в мельчайших деталях. Как на корабль напали, как я схватила оружие и бросилась к ней, полагая, что должна защитить избранницу Императора. И что я увидела, вбежав в кабинет? Теодору фон Валанциус, Вольного Торговца — со зловещим колдовским артефактом в руках, сияющим нечистым светом!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "I remember every last detail. The ship was under attack. I grabbed my weapon and ran to her side, because I thought it was my duty to protect the Emperor's chosen. And what did I witness when I burst into her study? Theodora von Valancius, a Rogue Trader, holding a sinister sorcerous artefact radiating with profane light!"
languages.original_text: "Я помню все в мельчайших деталях. Как на корабль напали, как я схватила оружие и бросилась к ней, полагая, что должна защитить избранницу Императора. И что я увидела, вбежав в кабинет? Теодору фон Валанциус, Вольного Торговца — со зловещим колдовским артефактом в руках, сияющим нечистым светом!"

traits.locale_text: "I remember every last detail. How the ship was attacked, how I grabbed my weapon and ran to her side because I thought it was my duty to protect the Emperor's chosen. And what did I witness when I burst into her study? Theodora von Valancius, a Rogue Trader, holding a sinister sorcerous artefact radiating with profane light!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I remember every last detail. How the ship was attacked, how I grabbed my weapon and ran to her side because I thought it was my duty to protect the Emperor's chosen. And what did I witness when I burst into her study? Theodora von Valancius, a Rogue Trader, holding a sinister sorcerous artefact radiating with profane light!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

And what did I witness when I burst into her room? Theodora von Valancius, a Rogue Trader, holding a sinister sorcerous artefact radiating with profane light!"

And what did I witness when I burst into her room? Theodora von Valancius, a Rogue Trader, holding a sinister sorcerous artefact radiating with profane light!"

And what did I witness when I burst into her study? Theodora von Valancius, a Rogue Trader, holding a sinister sorcerous artefact radiating with profane light!"

traits.locale_text: "I remember every last detail. The ship was under attack. I grabbed my weapon and ran to her side, because I thought it was my duty to protect the Emperor's chosen. And what did I witness when I burst into her study? Theodora von Valancius, a Rogue Trader, holding a sinister sorcerous artefact radiating with profane light!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「細かいことまでハッキリを覚えているわ。船が攻撃されたとき、私は武器を手に彼女のそばに駆け寄った。皇帝のチョーズンを守るのが私の務めだと思ったからよ。そして彼女の書斎に飛び込んだとき、何を目にしたか分かる？自由開拓者のシオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスが、邪悪な光を放つ不吉なアーティファクトを手にしていたのよ！」
languages.original_text: "I remember every last detail. The ship was under attack. I grabbed my weapon and ran to her side, because I thought it was my duty to protect the Emperor's chosen. And what did I witness when I burst into her study? Theodora von Valancius, a Rogue Trader, holding a sinister sorcerous artefact radiating with profane light!"

traits.locale_text: 「細かいことまでハッキリを覚えているわ。船が攻撃されたとき、私は武器を手に彼女のそばに駆け寄った。皇帝のチョーズンを守るのが私の務めだと思ったからよ。そして彼女の書斎に飛び込んだとき、何を目にしたか分かる？自由開拓者のシオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスが、邪悪な光を放つ不吉なアーティファクトを手にしていたのよ！」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “每个细节我都记得清清楚楚。我记得飞船是如何遭到攻击，也记得我是如何拿着武器，冲到了她身边，因为我认为守护帝皇的神选者是我的职责。可当我冲进书房的时候，我看到了什么？我看到西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯，身为行商浪人，手里居然拿着邪恶的巫术造物！那件造物散发着亵渎之光！”
languages.original_text: "I remember every last detail. The ship was under attack. I grabbed my weapon and ran to her side, because I thought it was my duty to protect the Emperor's chosen. And what did I witness when I burst into her study? Theodora von Valancius, a Rogue Trader, holding a sinister sorcerous artefact radiating with profane light!"

traits.locale_text: “每个细节我都记得清清楚楚。我记得飞船是如何遭到攻击，也记得我是如何拿着武器，冲到了她身边，因为我认为守护帝皇的神选者是我的职责。可当我冲进房间的时候，我看到了什么？我看到西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯，身为行商浪人，手里居然拿着邪恶的巫术造物！那件造物散发着亵渎之光！”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Recuerdo hasta el último detalle. La nave fue atacada. Cogí mi arma y corrí a su lado porque creía que era mi deber proteger a la elegida del Emperador. ¿Y qué presencié cuando irrumpí en su estudio? A Theodora von Valancius, una Comerciante Independiente, sosteniendo un siniestro artefacto hechicero que irradiaba luz profana».
languages.original_text: "I remember every last detail. The ship was under attack. I grabbed my weapon and ran to her side, because I thought it was my duty to protect the Emperor's chosen. And what did I witness when I burst into her study? Theodora von Valancius, a Rogue Trader, holding a sinister sorcerous artefact radiating with profane light!"

traits.locale_text: «Recuerdo hasta el último detalle. Cómo atacaron la nave y cómo cogí mi arma y corrí a su lado porque creía que era mi deber proteger a la elegida del Emperador. ¿Y qué presencié cuando irrumpí en su habitación? A Theodora von Valancius, una Comerciante Independiente, sosteniendo un siniestro artefacto hechicero que irradiaba luz profana».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich erinnere mich an jedes noch so kleine Detail. Das Schiff wurde angegriffen. Ich griff nach meiner Waffe und rannte zu ihr, weil ich dachte, es sei meine Pflicht, die Auserwählte des Imperators zu beschützen. Und was habe ich gesehen, als ich in ihre Kammer geplatzt bin? Theodora von Valancius, eine Freihändlerin, die ein finsteres magisches Artefakt in der Hand hält, aus dem profanes Licht erstrahlt!"
languages.original_text: "I remember every last detail. The ship was under attack. I grabbed my weapon and ran to her side, because I thought it was my duty to protect the Emperor's chosen. And what did I witness when I burst into her study? Theodora von Valancius, a Rogue Trader, holding a sinister sorcerous artefact radiating with profane light!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich erinnere mich an jedes noch so kleine Detail. Wie das Schiff angegriffen wurde und ich meine Waffe gepackt und an ihre Seite gerannt bin, weil ich dachte, es sei meine Pflicht, die Auserwählte des Imperators zu beschützen. Und was habe ich gesehen, als ich in ihr Zimmer geplatzt bin? Theodora von Valancius, eine Freihändlerin, die ein finsteres magisches Artefakt in der Hand hält, aus dem profanes Licht erstrahlt!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Je m'en souviens jusque dans les moindres détails. Le vaisseau a été attaqué. J'ai attrapé mon arme et couru pour la rejoindre, persuadée qu'il était de mon devoir de protéger l'élue de l'Empereur. Et en faisant irruption dans ses quartiers, j'ai surpris Théodora von Valancius, une libre-marchande, avec entre les mains un artefact maléfique et sinistre irradiant d'une lumière impie ! »
languages.original_text: "I remember every last detail. The ship was under attack. I grabbed my weapon and ran to her side, because I thought it was my duty to protect the Emperor's chosen. And what did I witness when I burst into her study? Theodora von Valancius, a Rogue Trader, holding a sinister sorcerous artefact radiating with profane light!"

traits.locale_text: « Je m'en souviens jusqu'au moindre détail. Le moment où le vaisseau a été attaqué, l'instant où j'ai attrapé mon arme et couru pour la rejoindre, persuadée qu'il était de mon devoir de protéger l'élue de l'Empereur. Et la seconde où, en faisant irruption dans ses quartiers, j'ai surpris Théodora von Valancius, une libre-marchande, avec entre les mains un artefact maléfique et sinistre irradiant d'une lumière impie ! »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "En ufak ayrıntısına kadar hatırlıyorum. Gemi saldırıya uğramıştı. Silahıma davranıp yanına koştum. Ne de olsa İmparator'un seçilmişini korumak vazifemdi. Fakat çalışma odasına daldığımda ne göreyim... Hür Tacir Theodora von Valancius; elinde fena ışıklar saçan, meşum, sihirli bir eser tutuyordu!"
languages.original_text: "I remember every last detail. The ship was under attack. I grabbed my weapon and ran to her side, because I thought it was my duty to protect the Emperor's chosen. And what did I witness when I burst into her study? Theodora von Valancius, a Rogue Trader, holding a sinister sorcerous artefact radiating with profane light!"

traits.locale_text: "En ufak ayrıntısına kadar hatırlıyorum. Gemi saldırıya uğramıştı. Silahıma davranıp yanına koştum. Ne de olsa İmparator'un Seçilmişi'ni korumak vazifemdi. Fakat çalışma odasına daldığımda ne göreyim? Hür Tacir Theodora von Valancius, elinde fena ışıklar saçan meşum bir sihirli eser tutuyordu!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
